name: Freight Elevator VR
description:
*** Important: this VR experience requires a cardboard or a similar stereoscopic viewer ***

An old rusted freight elevator is waiting for you!
Look at the keypad to begin the experience and let the freight elevator become a “fright elevator”!
The cabin will go out of control and you will be thrown down the shaft…
Are you ready?

For more information:
http://www.freightelevator.eu
